metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15101 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A missing patch for a stack-based buffer overflow in findTable() was found in Red Hat version of liblouis before 2.5.4. An attacker could cause a denial of service condition or potentially even arbitrary code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15101` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> our fix already incorporate Samuel`s patch as CVE-2014-8184 it only affects versions before 2.5.4

criterions.comment: liblouis package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1').
